verbose_text: Confocal microscopic images showed that NIR laser irradiation increased the intracellular DOX fluorescence of DOX@PGNCs and DOX@pPGNCs at both pH 7.4 and 6.5, revealing the NIR laser induced photothermal effects resulted in intracellular drug release from DOX@pPGNCs.
evidence: NIR laser irradiation increased the intracellular DOX fluorescence of DOX@PGNCs and DOX@pPGNCs at both pH
